sentences.sContent: an attempt to smear the party leadership
sentences.sCn: 污蔑党领导的 企图

synos.tran: 诽谤；弄脏；涂上；把…擦模糊

trans.tranCn: 诽谤；弄脏；涂上；把…擦模糊
trans.tranOther: to tell an untrue story about someone important in order to make people lose respect for them – used especially in newspapers
a dirty mark made by a small amount of something spread across a surface
